content.rendered:
The Conference and Event Planning team would love to host your next conference, symposium, banquet, overnight camp, film shoot and more at the University of La Verne! Our department can supply you with overnight housing accommodations, dining hall services, catering, parking and a variety of indoor and outdoor event spaces. Our mission is to provide our guests with the best experience possible and work together to create a smooth, successful event.

If you are a school group interested in a campus tour, please complete this form.

Note: This page intended to assist non-University of La Verne groups with their Conference and Event Planning. University of La Verne internal groups, please email to schedule an event.

Launch Experience
Interest Form

To request a quote and find out more information, please fill out the following survey!

Get Started
View Event Spaces

Learn more about the type of venues available at the University of La Verne.

Get Started
On-Campus Housing

Check out our three on-campus residence halls for your stay at the University of La Verne.

Take a Tour
Dining

Explore on-campus dining accommodations.

Learn More
